content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Electronic Circuit Factory at position(9.5, 11.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) that moves items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) that moves finished products to output chest
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing 801 electronic circuits

###Power Generation System at position(-7.0, 24.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network carrying steam from boiler to steam engine
- Electric pole network connecting power to various machines

###Smelting Area
Consists of three furnaces:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0)

###Science Pack Processing at position(0.5, 28.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(0.5, 28.5)
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5)
- Storage chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing 865 automation science packs and 347 logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Technology Research Errors
- Cannot research technologies that are already researched (steel-processing, advanced-material-processing, electric-energy-distribution-1, logistic-science-pack, military, automation-2)
- Research prerequisites must be completed before researching advanced technologies:
  - Chemical science pack requires advanced electronics
  - Advanced electronics requires plastics
  - Plastics requires oil processing
  - Oil processing requires fluid handling
  - Fluid handling requires engine
  - Electric engine requires lubricant

### Resource Management Errors
- Ensure sufficient coal is available before attempting to insert into boilers
- The boiler is currently out of fuel and needs coal to operate

### Production Issues
- Electronic circuit assembly machine lacks required ingredients (iron plates and copper cables)
- All furnaces are idle due to lack of input materials
